title: Rivens ult cd
body: Riven's ult with 45% CDR is on a 33 sec cooldown.....thats kinda ridiculous when you think about it right?!

replies.body: You mean when she is level 16 and itemized for CDR, no not really. By that point in the game there is this handy little thing called armor that works really well since they nerfed armor pen in the preseason.
Not disagreeing with you, but why wouldn't you be building max CDR on Riven?
Idk why you wouldn't, but you can only achieve what op is talking about by including CDR in your build which is why i said she is itemized for it.
Yet that's the only think Riot nerfs on her.
